"Yellow Flicker Beat" is a song by New Zealand recording artist Lorde. It was released on 29 September 2014 as the lead single from the soundtrack for The Hunger Games: Mockingjay Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Part 1 by Republic Records. The song was written by Lorde and Joel Little and produced by Paul Epworth. "Yellow Flicker Beat", which accompanied an electronic production, was characterised as an art pop and electropop number. Its style was compared to that of Lorde's earlier releases, including her song "Biting Down" from The Love Club EP (2013) and her debut studio album Pure Heroine (2013). The lyrics of the track reference the rise of The Hunger GamesÃ¢â‚¬Å 'Ã¢â‚¬â€¹ heroine Katniss Everdeen.
